properties.displayName: Suspicious Execution of InstallUtil Without Log
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "/logfile= " and ProcessCommandLine contains "/LogToConsole=false") and FolderPath contains "Microsoft.NET\\Framework" and FolderPath endswith "\\InstallUtil.exe"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Uses the .NET InstallUtil.exe application in order to execute image without log
